question: Which Union Ministry announced a phased restriction on the import of over 100 products?
option3: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation:
The Union Ministry of Defence (MoD) announced a phased restraint on the import of as many as 101 products of Defence equipment.
This decision has been announced on the lines of the Prime Ministerâ€™s Atmanirbhar Bharat (Self-Reliant India) initiative. As the Armed Forces will procure those items from Indian Defence Manufacturers, it will provide more opportunities and increased jobs.
